sch:schema.sch:title: Checking OIOUBL-2.1 Catalogue

sch:pattern.name: UBLExtensions
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the UBLExtensions class

sch:pattern.name: Profile
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating root element, Profile and UBL version

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CAT249] The documenttype does not match an OIOUBL Catalogue and can not be validated by this schematron.

sch:pattern.name: Catalogue
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the Catalogue structure

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CAT003] Invalid VersionID. Must contain a value
[F-CAT005] One ValidityPeriod class must be present
[F-CAT006] One SellerSupplierParty class must be present
[F-CAT002] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CAT007] ContractorCustomerParty must be different from ReceiverParty
[F-CAT008] No more than one ReferencedContract class must be present

sch:pattern.name: ValidityPeriod
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the ValidityPeriod class

sch:pattern.name: ReferencedContract
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the ReferencedContract class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CAT020] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CAT022] No more than one ContractDocumentReference class may be present

sch:pattern.name: Signature
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the Signature class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CAT030] Invalid ID. Must contain a value

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CAT031] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:pattern.name: ProviderParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the ProviderParty class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CAT040] Invalid EndpointID. Must contain a value
[F-CAT041] One PartyLegalEntity class must be present

sch:pattern.name: ReceiverParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the ReceiverParty class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CAT050] Invalid EndpointID. Must contain a value
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CAT051] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:pattern.name: SellerSupplierParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the SellerSupplierParty class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CAT061] One Party class must be present

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CAT062] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:pattern.name: ContractorCustomerParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the ContractorCustomerParty class

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CAT071] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:pattern.name: TradingTerms
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the TradingTerms class

sch:schema.sch:pattern:
Pattern for validating the CatalogueLine class
[F-CAT114] DocumentReference class must be excluded
[F-CAT101] Invalid ActionCode. Must contain a value [F-CAT106] Invalid OrderableIndicator. Must contain a value [F-CAT108] Invalid ContentUnitQuantity. Must contain a value
[F-CAT100] Invalid ID. Must contain a value [F-CAT248] CatalogueLine.ID must be unique within the document instance [F-CAT102] Invalid listID. Must be ''
[F-CAT103] Invalid listAgencyID. Must be ''
[F-CAT111] Invalid ActionCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-CAT115] When OrderableIndicator equals 'true' the element OrderableUnit must be filled out
[F-CAT113] No more than one ItemComparison class may be present
[F-CAT104] Invalid listID. Must be ''
[F-CAT105] Invalid listAgencyID. Must be ''
[F-CAT112] Invalid LifeCycleStatusCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-CAT107] The value of unitCode attribute should be a valid UOM measure
[W-CAT109] The attribute languageID should be used when more than one WarrantyInformation element is present
[W-CAT110] Multilanguage error. Replicated WarrantyInformation elements with same languageID attribute value
[F-CAT120] Party class must be present
[F-CAT121] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present
[F-CAT130] DataSendingCapability element must be excluded
[F-CAT131] Party class must be present
[F-CAT132] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present
[F-CAT140] Invalid PriceAmount. Must contain a value [F-CAT141] Invalid Quantity. Must contain a value
[F-CAT150] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-CAT160] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-CAT170] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
>
[F-CAT180] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-CAT190] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-CAT200] No more than one TradingRestrictions element may be present
[F-CAT201] Invalid PriceAmount. Must contain a value [F-CAT207] No more than one ValidityPeriod class may be present
[F-CAT202] Invalid PriceAmount. Must have at least 2 decimals
[F-CAT203] Invalid PriceAmount. Must not be negative
[W-CAT204] The attribute languageID should be used when more than one PriceChangeReason element is present
[W-CAT205] Multilanguage error. Replicated PriceChangeReason elements with same languageID attribute value
[F-CAT206] Invalid listID. Must be 'UN/ECE 5387'
[F-CAT220] CatalogueIndicator element must be excluded
[F-CAT234] ClassifiedTaxCategory class must be excluded
[F-CAT221] Invalid Name. Must contain a value [F-CAT223] One SellersItemIdentification class must be present
[F-CAT230] At least one CommodityClassification class must be present
[F-CAT228] No more than one ManufacturersItemIdentification class may be present
[F-CAT229] No more than one AdditionalItemIdentification class may be present
[F-CAT244] No more than one OriginAddress class may be present
[F-CAT224] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-CAT242] PositionCode element must be excluded [F-CAT243] DescriptionCode element must be excluded
[F-CAT226] Invalid Description. Must contain a value
[F-CAT225] Invalid AttributeID. Must contain a value
[F-CAT227] Invalid AttributeID. Must contain a value
[F-CAT231] Invalid ItemClassificationCode. Must contain a value
[F-CAT232] Invalid listID. Must be 'UNSPSC' [F-CAT233] Invalid listAgencyID. Must be '113'
[F-CAT235] Invalid Name. Must contain a value [F-CAT236] Invalid Value. Must contain a value
[F-CAT237] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-CAT245] Invalid Name. Must contain a value [F-CAT246] Invalid Value. Must contain a value
[F-CAT247] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-CAT238] Invalid Name. Must contain a value [F-CAT239] Invalid Value. Must contain a value
[F-CAT240] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
